title: Gottlieb - All Ball - Juwan Howard to Michigan thoughts; KD's All-NBA snub; Blazers Asst. David Vanterpool goes inside their playoff run
itunes:title: Gottlieb - All Ball - Juwan Howard to Michigan thoughts; KD's All-NBA snub; Blazers Asst. David Vanterpool goes inside their playoff run
description:
Subscribe here to the All Ball with Doug Gottlieb Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/all-ball-with-doug-gottlieb/id1358843497?mt=2. 

This week, Gottlieb gives his thoughts on Juwan Howard taking the Michigan job, and why the long lasting fame of the Fab 5 proves his point about the benefits of playing college sports, why Kevin Durant was robbed 1st Team All-NBA headscratcher of Paul George over Kevin Durant, and is joined by Blazers Asst. Dave Vanterpool who gives an inside look at Portland's dramatic playoff run, and what makes the Warriors unstoppable.. Download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts:

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
